title: Roasted cod with macadamia nut relish, vanilla lemons and broccoli
description: Deep-fried broccoli and macadamia nuts add crunch to delicately baked cod.Equipment: You will need a deep-fat fryer or a deep, heavy-bottomed frying pan.
ingredients: 1 vanilla pod, seeds removed and pod retained
4 tbsp olive oil, plus extra for frying
2 x 250g/9oz thick cut cod loin, pin-boned, skin on
1 unwaxed lemon, finely grated zest and juice
